title: Fastik
text: 01. We’re Food Safe! Fastik has AIB Food Safe Recognition. Our customers can rest assured that the packaging they receive will be safe for use with food products. 02. Great print results start in the art department! One of the keys to great print results is advanced pre-press technologies. Fastik utilizes the most advanced color management system available in the industry, offering a high degree of print predictability, including digital proofing for 4 color process (CMYK) printing. 03. Wicketed Bags Whether for bakery or produce, Fastik is known for quick turn-around on bag projects where new plates are required About Fastik Our business is to simplify and enhance your market communications with high quality printing and packaging. At Fastik, our leading-edge equipment, technology, and labeling/packaging consultants, are well positioned to be your partner for many types of label and packaging applications… Fastik Products - Flexible Packaging More Info We manufacture many types of flexible packaging in our AIB 3rd party food safety audited facility. We are ready to print up to 8 colors on up to 43” wide material with HD printing plates also made in-house. Fastik Products - Adhesive Labels More Info How demanding are your label and packaging needs? At Fastik, we use leading-edge flexographic printing/converting and digital equipment to create labels from blanks to 8 colors, including 4 color process. Even your most sophisticated label demands can be met on a variety of substrates. We utilize the most advanced color measurement devices available to ensure run to run consistency. Your labels will be custom made to meet your visual and functional specifications. - Printing up to 8 colors - Hi-Def Plates - Varnish/Lamination - Variety of Adhesives and substrates - Labels in rolls, sheeted, and fan-folded - Flexible lead-times Fastik Products - Lumber Tags More Info Our labels and tags surpass the most demanding applications. We are a trusted supplier to businesses from small specialty mills to many of North America’s largest forest product companies. We use specialty adhesives, inks, and substrates to outlast even the most extreme temperature and climate changes. From the sub-zero temperatures of Northern Canada to the heat and humidity of the Southern U.S.A you can depend on our labels and tags for any application. - Durable products made to last in any climate - Cost effective label and tag products - Temperature resilient - Tags for use in Fastagger™, Timber Tagger™, and BeA Gun applicators™ - Lift-labels, staple-on tags, and placards - Adhesive labels for automated label applications
